column5: If you have been successful with large or many: walleye, northern pike, muskie or smallies near Sioux Lookout, recently and would be willing to share where and how, it would be greatly appreciated. We plan to be there within the next few days. A location new to us. Thanks. Joe
A jig and minnow are always in fashion, but when we were up there last thursday nighcrawlers seemed to be outfishing the minnows. We did not try anything else, didn't have to.
